languages.text: "Вольному Торговцу можно многое. На Футфоле — всё. Но некоторым, все же, хватает мудрости не пользоваться этим правом настолько".
"A Rogue Trader's privileges are extensive. On Footfall, they are limitless. But some still are wise enough not to exercise those privileges to the fullest."
languages.original_text: "Вольному Торговцу можно многое. На Футфоле — всё. Но некоторым, все же, хватает мудрости не пользоваться этим правом настолько".

traits.locale_text: "A Rogue Trader's privileges are extensive. On Footfall, they are limitless. But some still are wise enough not to exercise those privileges to the fullest."
"A Rogue Trader's privileges are extensive. On Footfall, they are limitless. But some still are wise enough not to exercise those privileges to the fullest."
"A Rogue Trader's privileges are extensive. On Footfall, they are limitless. But some still are wise enough not to exercise those privileges to the fullest."
"A Rogue Trader's privileges are extensive. On Footfall, they are limitless. But some still are wise enough not to exercise those privileges to the fullest."
"A Rogue Trader's privileges are extensive. On Footfall, they are limitless. But some still are wise enough not to exercise those privileges to the fullest."

languages.text: "Die Privilegien {mf|eines Freihändlers|einer Freihändlerin} sind weitreichend. Auf Footfall sind sie grenzenlos. Einige sind aber dennoch so weise, diese Privilegien nicht voll auszuschöpfen."
languages.original_text: "A Rogue Trader's privileges are extensive. On Footfall, they are limitless. But some still are wise enough not to exercise those privileges to the fullest."

traits.locale_text: "Die Privilegien {mf|eines Freihändlers|einer Freihändlerin} sind weitreichend. Auf Footfall sind sie grenzenlos. Einige sind aber dennoch so weise, diese Privilegien nicht voll auszuschöpfen."

languages.text: « Les privilèges d'{mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande} sont nombreux. Et sur Castel, ils sont carrément illimités. Mais certains ont tout de même la sagesse de ne pas les exercer pleinement. »
languages.original_text: "A Rogue Trader's privileges are extensive. On Footfall, they are limitless. But some still are wise enough not to exercise those privileges to the fullest."

traits.locale_text: « Les privilèges d'{mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande} sont nombreux. Et sur Castel, ils sont carrément illimités. Mais certains ont tout de même la sagesse de ne pas les exercer pleinement. »

languages.text: «Los privilegios de cualquier Comerciante Independiente son extensos. En Paso, son prácticamente infinitos. Pero todavía hay gente lo bastante sensata como para no ejercerlos en su totalidad».
languages.original_text: "A Rogue Trader's privileges are extensive. On Footfall, they are limitless. But some still are wise enough not to exercise those privileges to the fullest."

traits.locale_text: «Los privilegios de cualquier Comerciante Independiente son extensos. En Paso, son prácticamente infinitos. Pero todavía hay gente lo bastante sensata como para no ejercerlos en su totalidad».

languages.text: 「ローグトレーダーの特権は広範囲に及ぶ。フットフォールでは無制限だ。しかし、それでもその特権を最大限に行使しない賢明な者もいる」
languages.original_text: "A Rogue Trader's privileges are extensive. On Footfall, they are limitless. But some still are wise enough not to exercise those privileges to the fullest."

traits.locale_text: 「ローグトレーダーの特権は広範囲に及ぶ。フットフォールでは無制限だ。しかし、それでもその特権を最大限に行使しない賢明な者もいる」

languages.text: “行商浪人拥有相当程度的特权，而在落脚港这种地方，他们的特权完全不受约束。但依然有些人不够明智，不会充分行使这些特权。”
languages.original_text: "A Rogue Trader's privileges are extensive. On Footfall, they are limitless. But some still are wise enough not to exercise those privileges to the fullest."

traits.locale_text: “行商浪人拥有相当程度的特权，而在落脚港这种地方，他们的特权完全不受约束。但依然有些人不够明智，不会充分行使这些特权。”

languages.original_text: "A Rogue Trader's privileges are extensive. On Footfall, they are limitless. But some still are wise enough not to exercise those privileges to the fullest."

languages.text: "Hür Tacir'in ayrıcalıkları nicedir. Binliman'da sınırı yoktur. Ancak bu ayrıcalıkları sonuna dek kullanmayacak kadar akıllı olanları hâlâ mevcuttur."
languages.original_text: "A Rogue Trader's privileges are extensive. On Footfall, they are limitless. But some still are wise enough not to exercise those privileges to the fullest."
